main event: A witness observed one round object resembling a dark grey basketball in Bellingham, Washington on 8 March 1956.
interesting points: The object appeared balloon-like and was seen in level flight for about 2 minutes., The witness was a 70-year-old civilian., The object went behind a mill and its course and speed were unknown., The sighting is consistent with aircraft analysis, indicating the possibility of a balloon or aircraft., There are no photographs present in the report.
sighted object: one round object resembling a dark grey basketball
